p:
Dated phylogenies of large transmission clusters (those containing at least 10 patients from the CV
46 ) were obtained with BEAST v1.8.1
47 , similarly as in Patiño-Galindo et al.
25 . In those clusters with low root-to-tip divergence vs sampling date correlation (R < 0.4), a log-normal prior (median = 0.0025 per site and year, s/s/y, 95% HPD upper limit = 0.0035 s/s/y)
17 was placed on the ucld.mean parameter.
